attributes.action: encourage backyard chicken keeping and allow cockerals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: keeping chickens in your backyard is becoming increasingly popular, fresh eggs, no food miles. home grown chicken, bteach children were their food comes from and will help to stop battery farms. councils are against the noise, which is less than aircraft, cars, dogs, wild birds, music etc. millions of cockerals are needlessly killed each year as people are not allowed to keep them as they make a wonderul sound that is part of british nature.
